description.en:
A course for international students aimed at providing
basic knowledge of grammar and practising oral skills.
description.et:
Välistudengitele suunatud keeleõppe kursus, mis hõlmab nii
kõnekeele kui grammatika valdkondi.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give initial knowledge of
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda algteadmisi ungari keelest:

objectives.en: Hungarian: to develop oral and written skills.

learning_outcomes.en: The course gives knowledge at pre-intermediate level.
Course is meant to increase student's vocabulary and grammar skills,
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse käigus laiendatakse sõnavara, arendatakse lugemis-, vestlus- ja

learning_outcomes.en: develop reading comprehension, conversational and listening skills.

description.et: Homework and course attendance. 25% of the final grade
3 tests. Each is 25% of the final grade.

grade_preconditions.et:
Completing all the homeworks and tests and participating in the 10-minute conversation at the end of the semester.
Kodutööde ja kontrolltööde sooritamine, ning osalemine suulisel lõpphindamisel.

grade_evaluation.et:
3 tests. Each is 25% ofthe final grade.
Homework and course attendance. 25% of the final grade
10-minute conversation at the end of the semester.

3 kontrolltööd iga üks 25% lõpphindest
Suuline lõpphindamine 25% lõpphindest
Kodutööde esitamine, aktiivsus tunnis.

debt_elimination.et:
To be discussed with the teacher.
Kokkuleppel õppejõuga.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
